DOC.HEAD: British Opposition Leader to Meet Gorbachev in Moscow
DOC.TEXT: Neil Kinnock, leader of the opposition Labor Party, will meet with Soviet President Mikhail S. Gorbachev in Moscow on Jan. 16, a party spokesman said Sunday. No details of the visit were available, said the spokesman, speaking anonymously in keeping with British custom. He said Kinnock had a longstanding invitation from Gorbachev`and that the trip would be ``short and businesslike.'' Kinnock last visited Moscow in November 1984 for talks with Konstantin Chernenko, who was the Soviet leader at that time.
